resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81549</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81549</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5000</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Shepherd , the Sheep and the Big Bad Wolf</string>
            <string language="es">El pastor, la oveja y el gran lobo malo</string>
            <string language="ga">An tAoire, an Chaora agus an Mac Tíre Mór Gránna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Schäferhund, die Schafe und der grosse 
falsche Wolf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le berger, les moutons et le grand mauvais loup</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O shepherd, os carneiros e o lobo mau grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo shepherd, le pecore ed il lupo difettoso 
grande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ποιμένας, τα πρόβατα και ο μεγάλος κακός λύκος</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson examining different behaviour types: aggressive, passive and assertive. Involves completion of a worksheet and discussion on the characteristics of these types.</string>
            <string language="es">Lección que examina diferentes tipos de conducta: Agresiva, pasiva y asertiva. Se debe rellenar una hoja de trabajo y hablar sobre las características de estos tipos.</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceacht a fhéachann ar chineálacha difriúla iompair: ionsaitheach, éighníomhach agus treallúsach. Tá líonadh bileog oibre agus plé ar na cineálacha difriúla seo san áireamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion, die unterschiedliche Verhaltentypen 
überprüft: konkurrenzfähig, passiv und assertive. 
Bezieht Beendigung eines Bogens und der Diskussion auf den 
Eigenschaften dieser Typen mit ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçon examinant différents types de 
comportement : agressif, passif et autoritaire. Implique 
l'accomplissement d'un tableau et d'une discussion sur les 
caractéristiques de ces types.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lição que examina tipos diferentes do 
comportamento: aggressive, passivo e assertive. Envolve a 
conclusão de uma folha e de uma discussão nas características 
destes tipos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezione che esamina i tipi differenti di 
comportamento: aggressivo, passivo ed assertive. Coinvolge
il completamento di un foglio di lavoro e di una discussione sulle 
caratteristiche di questi tipi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάθημα που εξετάζει τους διαφορετικούς τύπους 
συμπεριφοράς: επιθετικός, παθητικός και κατηγορηματικός. 
Περιλαμβάνει την ολοκλήρωση ενός φύλλου εργασίας και τη 
συζήτηση σχετικά με τα χαρακτηριστικά αυτών των τύπων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
